trans-unit.source: Provides a managed definition of the <see langword="ITypeLib2" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see langword="ITypeLib2" /> 介面的 Managed 定義。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the `ITypeLib2` interface, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib2`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 原生程式碼的 COM 方法傳回的 HRESULT 時，common language runtime 會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A hash value to speed up the search, computed by the <see langword="LHashValOfNameSys" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 用來加速搜尋的雜湊值 (Hash Value)，由 <see langword="LHashValOfNameSys" /> 函式計算而得。

trans-unit.source: If <c>lHashVal</c> is 0, a value is computed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>lHashVal</c> 為 0，表示值已計算出來。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an array of pointers to the type descriptions that contain the name specified in <c>szNameBuf</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含類型描述的指標陣列，其中包含 <c>szNameBuf</c> 中指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an array of the <see langword="MEMBERID" />s of the found items; <c>rgMemId</c> [i] is the <see langword="MEMBERID" /> that indexes into the type description specified by <c>ppTInfo</c> [i].
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含所找到項目之 <see langword="MEMBERID" /> 的陣列；<c>rgMemId</c> [i] 為 <see langword="MEMBERID" />，其索引至由 <c>ppTInfo</c> [i] 所指定的類型描述。

trans-unit.source: This parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: On entry, a value, passed by reference, that indicates how many instances to look for.
trans-unit.target: 項目上以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞的值，指出要尋找的執行個體 (Instance) 數目。

trans-unit.source: For example, <c>pcFound</c> = 1 can be called to find the first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要尋找第一個符合項目可以呼叫 <c>pcFound</c> = 1。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when one instance is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個執行個體時，搜尋便會停止。

trans-unit.source: On exit, indicates the number of instances that were found.
trans-unit.target: 結束時，表示找到的執行個體數目。

trans-unit.source: If the <see langword="in" /> and <see langword="out" /> values of <c>pcFound</c> are identical, there might be more type descriptions that contain the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>pcFound</c> 的 <see langword="in" /> 和 <see langword="out" /> 值相同，可能還有更多包含該名稱的類型描述。

trans-unit.source: Finds occurrences of a type description in a type library.
trans-unit.target: 尋找型別描述在型別程式庫中的符合項目。

trans-unit.source: There must be enough room in the `rgMemId` parameter to hold the `pcFound` entries.
trans-unit.target: 必須有足夠的空間中`rgMemId`參數，以保留`pcFound`項目。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::FindName`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::FindName`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to <see langword="CUSTDATA" />, which holds all custom data items.
trans-unit.target: 指向保留所有自訂資料項目的 <see langword="CUSTDATA" /> 指標。

trans-unit.source: Gets all custom data items for the library.
trans-unit.target: 取得程式庫的所有自訂資料項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> , passed by reference, that is used to identify the data.
trans-unit.target: 由參考傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，用來識別資料。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that specifies where to put the retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時會包含一個物件，該物件指定要放置所擷取資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom data.
trans-unit.target: 取得自訂資料。

trans-unit.source: An index of the type description whose documentation is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其文件之型別描述的索引。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string that specifies the name of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含指定特定項目名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the documentation string for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含指定項目的文件字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the Help context identifier associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含與指定項目關聯的說明主題識別項。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string that specifies the fully qualified name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含指定說明檔完整名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the library's documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, and the context identifier for the library Help topic in the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 擷取程式庫的文件字串、完整的說明檔名稱和路徑，以及說明檔中程式庫說明主題的主題代碼。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: An index of the type description whose documentation is to be returned; if <c>index</c> is -1, the documentation for the library is returned.
trans-unit.target: 將要傳回其文件的類型描述之索引；如果 <c>index</c> 為 -1，則傳回文件庫的文件。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a BSTR that specifies the name of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法回傳時，會包含可指定已指定項目名稱的 BSTR。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not need the item name, <c>pbstrHelpString</c> can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫者不需要項目名稱，<c>pbstrHelpString</c> 可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the Help localization context.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法回傳時，包會包含該「說明」的本地化內容。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not need the Help context, <c>pdwHelpStringContext</c> can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫者不需要說明內容，<c>pdwHelpStringContext</c> 可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a BSTR that specifies the fully qualified name of the file containing the DLL used for Help file.
trans-unit.target: 當此方法回傳時，會包含 BSTR，其中有指定用於「說明」檔案之 DLL 的檔案的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not need the file name, <c>pbstrHelpStringDll</c> can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫者不需要檔案名稱，<c>pbstrHelpStringDll</c> 可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the library's documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, the localization context to use, and the context ID for the library Help topic in the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 抓取主題庫文件字串、完整「說明」檔案名稱與路徑、要使用的當地語系化內容，以及「說明」檔案中「說明」主題庫的內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a structure that contains the library's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含了含有程式庫屬性的結構。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the structure that contains the library's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含程式庫之屬性 (Attribute) 的結構。

trans-unit.source: The values of the structure referenced by the `ppTLibAttr` parameter can be obtained using the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 值所參考的結構`ppTLibAttr`參數可透過使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeLibAttr`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a count of unique names.
trans-unit.target: 唯一名稱計數的指標。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not need this information, set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端不需要這項資訊，請設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a change in the count of unique names.
trans-unit.target: 當這方法傳回時，會包含唯一名稱計數器變更的指標。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Returns statistics about a type library that are required for efficient sizing of hash tables.
trans-unit.target: 傳回有效調整雜湊資料表大小所需的型別程式庫相關統計資料。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib2::GetLibStatistics`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib2::GetLibStatistics`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an <see langword="ITypeComp" /> instance for this <see langword="ITypeLib" />.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含這個 <see langword="ITypeComp" /> 的 <see langword="ITypeLib" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Enables a client compiler to bind to a library's types, variables, constants, and global functions.
trans-unit.target: 讓用戶端編譯器 (Compiler) 繫結至程式庫的型別、變數、常數和全域函式。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeComp`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeComp`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: An index of the <see langword="ITypeInfo" /> interface to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之 <see langword="ITypeInfo" /> 介面的索引。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an <see langword="ITypeInfo" /> describing the type referenced by <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含描述由 <c>index</c> 所參考之類型的 <see langword="ITypeInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified type description in the library.
trans-unit.target: 擷取程式庫中指定的型別描述。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of type descriptions in the type library.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別程式庫中型別描述的數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of type descriptions in the type library.
trans-unit.target: 型別程式庫中型別描述的數目。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" />, passed by reference, that represents the IID of the <see langword="CLSID" /> interface of the class whose type info is requested.
trans-unit.target: 以傳址方式傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，表示已要求其型別資訊之類別的 <see langword="CLSID" /> 介面 IID。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the requested <see langword="ITypeInfo" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含要求的 <see langword="ITypeInfo" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type description that corresponds to the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對應到所指定 GUID 的型別描述。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfGuid`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfGuid`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The index of the type description within the type library.
trans-unit.target: 型別程式庫中型別描述的索引。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the <see langword="TYPEKIND" /> enumeration for the type description.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含型別描述的 <see langword="TYPEKIND" /> 列舉型別之參考。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type of a type description.
trans-unit.target: 擷取型別描述的型別。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfType`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfType`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The string to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字串。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of <c>szNameBuf</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>szNameBuf</c> 的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a passed-in string contains the name of a type or member described in the library.
trans-unit.target: 指示傳入字串是否含有程式庫中所描述型別或成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="szNameBuf" /> was found in the type library; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在型別程式庫中找到 <paramref name="szNameBuf" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::IsName`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::IsName`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TLIBATTR" /> structure to release.
trans-unit.target: 要釋放的 <see langword="TLIBATTR" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" /> structure originally obtained from the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib.GetLibAttr(System.IntPtr@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 釋放原來從 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR" /> 方法取得的 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib.GetLibAttr(System.IntPtr@)" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::ReleaseTLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::ReleaseTLibAttr`，請參閱 MSDN Library。
